text: well, several of them look like download / network failures, so transient. But honestly it feels to me as if there was always something failing... Let me emphasis that I understand how difficult it can be to get these things stable, and how many hours or days one can waste on it -- been there, done there, for other (smaller) projects. But I feel it really takes away a lot from a CI if one cannot rely on the "green = good,  red = can ignore until submitter fixes it". Currently it seems to me as if most PRs are red even if they are perfectly fine. Again: that's my subjective impression from following PRs for a couple months now. Maybe I am wrong
